titles.title: CB 403 Isn't the Love of Jesus Something Wonderful

properties.copyright: Â©1961 John W. Peterson Music Company
properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
THERE WILL NEVER BE A SWEETER STORY,
Story of the Savior's love divine,
Love that brought Him from the realm of glory
Just to save a sinful soul like mine.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Oh, isn't the love of Jesus
Something wonderful, wonderful, wonderful.
Oh, isn't the love of Jesus
Something wonderful, wonderful it is to me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Boundless as the universe around me,
Reaching to the farthest soul away,
Saving, keeping love it was that found me,
That is why my heart can truly say:

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Love beyond our human comprehending,
Love of God in Christ, how can it be,
This will be my theme and never ending,
Great redeeming love of Calvary.
